content: 5 chain round 28 attach the chain with 1 single_crochet on the first front loops on the first leg continue and make 5 single_crochet on front loops make sure the yarn tail that you fasten_off with from first leg it s on the inside turn the first leg and continue crochet 6 single_crochet on the back loops continue crochet 5 single_crochet on the back of the chain now you are back to the second leg crochet 6 single_crochet on the front loops turn the leg and continue crochet 6 single_crochet on the back loops continue crochet 5 single_crochet on the front of the chain 34 join the first leg on the first front loop make 5 chain on the second leg 12 stitches turn around crochet 5 single_crochet on the and continue back of the chain the on the back loops that sticks out loops in the middle 6 single_crochet on the 5 single_crochet on the back 6 single_crochet on the back loops of the chain front loops 6 single_crochet on the 6 single_crochet on the first st back loops 5 single_crochet on the front front loops last st of the chain 8 round 29 4 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet x 3 increase 1 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet x 2 increase 42 round 30-42 42 single_crochet 13 rounds 42 tip if you want to make the sewing easier you can attach the cheeks now between rounds 33 and 37 now you will attach the arms round 43 7 single_crochet now take one of the arms and stitch it together with the body with 5 single_crochet 16 single_crochet take the other arms and stitch it together with the body with 5 single_crochet 9 single_crochet 42 place the arm against the body and crochet across all loops round 44 42 single_crochet 42 the following decreases will be on each side it it doesn t please change it accordingly round 45 9 single_crochet decrease 19 st decrease 10 single_crochet 40 round 46 40 single_crochet 40 round 47 9 single_crochet decrease 18 single_crochet decrease 9 single_crochet 38 round 48 38 single_crochet 38 round 49 9 single_crochet decrease 17 single_crochet decrease 8 single_crochet 36 9 ears continue from the body and make the first ear round 50 2 single_crochet attach a stitch marker on the next 15 single_crochet on stitch this will be your new beginning crochet first ear 15 single_crochet next round will start on the stitch where you attached the stitch marker 15 before you crochet the 15 single_crochet make sure it is exactly on the side of the body if not please change accordingly round 51 7 single_crochet decrease 6 single_crochet 14 round 52 14 single_crochet 14 round 53 6 single_crochet decrease 6 single_crochet 13 round 54-56 13 single_crochet 3 rounds 13 round 57 7 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet 12 round 58-60 12 single_crochet 3 rounds 12 round 61 7 single_crochet decrease 3 single_crochet 11 round 62 11 single_crochet 3 rounds 11 place a rattle or squezzy ball inside
